title: 83/563/EEC: Commission Decision of 4 November 1983 establishing that the apparatus described as 'JEOL - Electron Probe X-ray microanalyzer, model JXA-733, with accessories' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 4 November 1983
establishing that the apparatus described as 'JEOL - Electron Probe X-ray microanalyzer, model JXA-733, with accessories' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(83/563/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'JEOL - Electron Probe X-ray microanalyzer, model JXA-733, with accessories', which is the subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 29 April 1983, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 November 1983.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 74, 18. 3. 1982, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
